data.title: Number of paths between 2 points
data.statement: Given a two dimensional array representing a map, find the total number of paths between two opposite points (0,0) and (N-1,M-1). You can only move from left to right and from top to bottom. Value 0 means that you are free to go on a cell, value 1 is a non reachable cell
data.stubGenerator:
read M:int
read N:int
loop M read ROW:string(100)
write answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1 :>> An int [[M]] for the number of rows.
<<Line 2 :>> An int [[N]] for the number of cols.
<<[[M]] next lines:>> [[ROW]] A String representing the values of the cells of the row : 0 for an empty cell or 1 for a wall
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1 :>> An int representing the number of paths between the two opposite points of the map

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Given a two dimensional array representing a map, find the total number of paths between two opposite points (0,0) and (N-1,M-1). You can only move from left to right and from top to bottom. Value 0 means that you are free to go on a cell, value 1 is a non reachable cell
Input
Line 1 : An int M for the number of rows.
Line 2 : An int N for the number of cols.
M next lines: ROW A String representing the values of the cells of the row : 0 for an empty cell or 1 for a wall
Output
Line 1 : An int representing the number of paths between the two opposite points of the map
Constraints
1 ≤ M ≤ 10
1 ≤ N ≤ 10
Example
Input
2
2
00
00
Output
2
